summary: A documentary on the history and influence of the New York Review of Books.
cast: Barbara Epstein|W.H. Auden|Isaiah Berlin|Stephen Jay Gould|Elizabeth Hardwick|Václav Havel|Robert Lowell|Mary McCarthy|Andrei Sakharov|Gore Vidal|Michael Stuhlbarg|Patricia Clarkson|Richard Easton|Timothy Garton Ash|James Baldwin|Mary Beard|Ian Buruma|Michael Chabon|Noam Chomsky|Walter Cronkite|Mark Danner|Joan Didion|Jake Durrett|Hugh Eakin|Yasmine El Rashidi|Jason Epstein|Michael Greenberg|Rea Hederman|Zoë Heller|Jennifer Homans|Norman Mailer|Avishai Margalit|Daniel Mendelsohn|Darryl Pinckney|Charles Rosen|John Ryle|Robert Silvers|Susan Sontag|Keith Thomas|Colm Tóibín|Derek Walcott|Andy Warhol

title: 50 años de rebeldía
